title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 7100.10 - Amendment or waiver of rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 7100.10 - Amendment or waiver of rules

State Regulations

Consistent with applicable law, any rule
adopted by the commission may be amended, revoked, or waived in a specific
instance by the commission by the affirmative vote of eight commissioners
present at a duly constituted meeting. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
7100.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
